text: #hydroxychloroquine, #chloroquine & #azithromycin have been identified as potential treatments for #COVID19, but the AMA, APhA & ASHP have urged prescribers & pharmacies to use caution and avoid prophylactically prescribing & excessive ordering. Read why: https://t.co/3Wat4IbgW7 https://t.co/hvudUewECm
